snippet.title: Polylithic - Gameplay Trailer + Commentary
snippet.description:
Embark on a Paleolithic adventure in the first gameplay video for Polylithic – a third-person crafting survival game set in a colorful, low-poly world.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839060/Polylithic/
Discord: https://discord.gg/polyperfect
Web: https://www.polyperfect.com/polylithic
